meanings.sent1: Her nonacceptance of the invitation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nonacceptance of his apology left him feeling dejected.
meanings.sent3: The nonacceptance of the gift led to an awkward silence.
meanings.sent4: The nonacceptance of reality only prolonged his suffering.
meanings.sent5: The nonacceptance of change hindered their progress.

meanings.sent1: The nonacceptance of her ideas stifled creativity in the team.
meanings.sent2: His nonacceptance of criticism made it difficult for him to improve.
meanings.sent3: The nonacceptance of the new policy caused confusion among the staff.
meanings.sent4: The nonacceptance of diversity limits our growth as a society.
meanings.sent5: Their nonacceptance of failure held them back from trying new things.
